snippet: The first lady, after years of evangelizing exercise and good eating habits, will begin an initiative on Tuesday that seeks to increase the number of low-income students who attend college.
abstract: Michelle Obama, after nearly five years of evangelizing exercise and good eating habits, will begin a new initiative that seeks to increase the number of low-income students who pursue a college degree; program reflects first lady's own life and will immerse her more directly in her husband's policies.
lead_paragraph: The first lady, after years of evangelizing exercise and good eating habits, will begin an initiative on Tuesday that seeks to increase the number of low-income students who attend college.

headline.main: Michelle Obama Edges Into a Policy Role on Higher Education
headline.print_headline: Michelle Obama Edges Into a Policy Role on Higher Education
